description: The client had an existing automation dashboard that was used to create, monitor, deploy, and analyze bot traffic for a number of services. The initial task was for us to take the existing UI and a layer of polish to it so that it could be shared with executives.

While we were able to change the overall design, we werenâ€™t able to update any of the existing structure, layout, or controls. This presented a considerable challenge in creating a more harmonious experience. We decided to go with something that was a little more modern and brought color and icons into the navigation.
The new look was a hit with the existing users and upper management.

sections.title: Light & Dark
sections.description: We incorporated both a light and dark mode so that it could be seen and used by individuals or presented to management.

sections.title: Better for presentations
sections.description: A special executive mode, with a more streamlined interface, was also incorporated for those who only were going to evaluate or present the analytics.
